snippet.title: The Virtual Mirror - official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Play it loud! And don't forget to subscribe!

Stepping through a door in a game level, computer game hero Nick Vincible finds himself in the marketing department of his publisher. What follows is a sad and hilarious love story, a tale about sex, violence and greed - and monsters.

Visit https://www.thevirtualmirror.com for details!
Follow us on instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thevirtualmirror/
Become a follower on twitter: https://twitter.com/mirror_virtual
Like us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pg/TheVirtualMirror/

Excerpt from „The Divine Codesmith“ from „The Virtual Mirror“:

Music: Stefan Wurz
Story & Lyrics: Wolfgang Walk
Story & Lyrics Editor: Mark L. Barrett

Orchestrations: Tobias Quindel
Production: Stefan Wurz
Mix: Andreas Herr

Musicians:
Lead Vocals: Patrick Sühl as „Heph A.I. Stoss“
Backing Vocals: Yannik Gräf, Tobias Quindel and Michael Fanger as „The Coders“
Guitars: Johannes Weik, Tobias Quindel
Bass: Johannes Weik
Drums: Florian Weik
Keys: Tobias Quindel, Stefan Littmann
Trumpet: Johannes Knoll
Trombone: Volkmar Dietrich
Sax: Bastian Weiler
Flute: Walter Butkus

Video Production:
Concept: Wolfgang Walk
Graphics: Daniel Lieske
Additional Graphics & Concepts: Helge C. Balzer, Max Knoblich, Marian Nodorf
Realisation: Tristan Hachmeister

Media Relations: Dennis Diel (press(AT)thevirtualmirror.com)

Kickstarter, Patreon and Steady campaigns incoming!

Our deepest „Thank you“ to anyone involved!

Stay tuned!

(c) 2019 by Wolfgang Walk & Stefan Wurz
All rights reserved!

Please like the video and hit sucscribe in order for you to not miss out on future developments. Let's get this thing on stage!
